blockquote: Every day, our team merges into one orchestra. The main thing is to hear everyone's rhythm!
subtitle: International Charitable Foundation 'Hands of Friends'
p1: The charity organization «International Charitable Foundation «Hands of Friends» implements humanitarian and social projects for the provision of charitable and emergency aid.
p2: Project participants are mostly those who are most in need of outside help: vulnerable people, large families, the elderly, people with disabilities, IDPs, and victims of war.
p3: «Hands of Friends» works with participants through legal entities, namely representatives of the Military-Civilian Administration, local governments, humanitarian headquarters, social services, government departments, public and charitable organizations, etc.
title: About us
